attributes.action: Petition not to have a second E.U. Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Please, ALL OUT voters sign this Partition.

Thanks to everyone that signs
attributes.background:
If you do not want a second E.U. Referendum then please sign the petition.
If you want to show the individuals that have signed the Petition to have a second E.U. referendum that you only get to vote once - PLEASE SIGN!
